title: Untitled, Figure on Cloud Motif
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Two images one above the other executed in black line with black frame in Haring's characteristic "comic book" style. Upper image shows a crouching figure in a nuclear cloud motif with three angeles hovering. The lower image depicts a large figure with a black "X" on it's head instead of features and upraised arms ending in heads and arms rather than hands. On either side two figures run up steps carrying sticks. The date "1982" is prominately shown at lower center surrounding a nuclear symbol.
name: Poster
